snippet: Washington needs to press Baghdad to commit to democracy as well as security.
abstract: Editorial warns that sending more weapons to Iraq, which Pres Obama has predictably done to counter rising violence, will not solve a problem that has its roots in the political alienation of Sunnis and other minorities; accuses Prime Min Nuri Kamal al-Maliki of undermining the democratic process; urges the Obama administration to pressure Maliki and other Iraqi leaders to commit to democracy as well as security.
lead_paragraph: Washington needs to press Baghdad to commit to democracy as well as security.

headline.main: More Guns Will Not Save Iraq
headline.print_headline: More Guns Will Not Save Iraq
